mapper.select: SELECT v.voiceactor_id AS personId, v.name_kor AS nameKor, v.name_eng AS nameEng, v.profile_image AS profileImageUrl, IF(ulv.user_id IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS isLiked FROM voiceactor v LEFT JOIN userlikedvoiceactor ulv ON v.voiceactor_id = ulv.voiceactor_id AND user_id = #{userId} WHERE v.voiceactor_id = #{personId}
